ResearchProjectDef.label: Wraith technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Begin unlocking the secrets of Wraith bio-engineering—where everything is grown, pulsing, and slightly slimy.\nWarning: side effects may include telepathy and power hunger.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wraith armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research armor grown from bio-organic materials tailored to Wraith physiology. Flexible, durable, and mildly unsettling to the touch.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Force buckler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reverse-engineer a wrist-mounted Wraith repulsor field. Study captured shield matrices and mesh them with human shield-belt theory to fabricate compact bucklers that block both melee and gunfire. Caution: when the field collapses, the bearer is exposed—train your melee to strike while the glow still holds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wraith weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reverse-engineer Wraith energy weapons—organic-looking tools of destruction designed for elegant disintegration and maximum dread.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wraith hacking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reverse-engineer Wraith neural interface tech to bend machines to your will. Great for remote control, terrible for privacy.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->extracted a faint signal pulse from a dormant Wraith comm node
subject_story->spliced human tech into a decomposing Wraith device and it blinked at me
subject_story->picked up encrypted chatter between hibernating hive nodes
subject_story->accidentally connected to a Wraith drone's memory stream... and now I can't unsee it

ResearchProjectDef.label: Meat cultivation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to bio-cultivate fresh, nutritious meat without hunting, farming, or asking permission from your livestock.\nA breakthrough in sustainable horror.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cloning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the secrets of Wraith biotech to grow fresh bodies on demand. Who needs childhood trauma when you can skip straight to adulthood?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Full-body replication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock full-body replication for any pawn — Wraith, human, or unlucky intern. Copy everything: personality quirks, backstories, and traumatic childhood memories. It's like printing colonists... with extra steps.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Clone enhancement
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fine-tune your gene slurry to squeeze out stronger, faster, and sassier clones. Results may vary. Side effects may include telepathy and uncontrollable hissing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Reconstruction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Death is merely a suggestion. With advanced Wraith resurrection protocols, you can bring back any biomass blob.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wraith Generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the Wraith biomass generator—a power source fueled by cultivated organic matter.\nEfficient, grotesque, and perfect for the energy needs of a species that eats people.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wraith Dart
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain access to the Wraith Dart: a fast, lightly-armored starfighter used for hit-and-run attacks and lifeform abductions.\nNot recommended for gentle landings or claustrophobic pilots.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wraith Modification Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Adaptations of Wraith neural interface rigs and sensory dampening gear.\n\nWith this knowledge, your scientists can alter Dwarfgate control systems to block long-range subspace "backscatter," preventing unauthorized remote peeks into connected sites. Only after this research can your colony safely observe both ends of an active wormhole.
